title: Introduction to Systems
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of systems. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Principles of Ethics
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of ethics. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Applied Design
description: Comprehensive study of design with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Intermediate Design
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in design. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Ethics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in ethics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Design
description: In-depth analysis of design principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Senior Project Management
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of project management. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
